title: Families: earning and spending
creator_credit: George McQuilkin, James Kennedy, Jane Treiman and Churchill Films
brief_description: Shows the ways in which the three families introduced in the film “Families: alike and different” earn money and how they spend it on a variety of goods and services. The American parents work at separate jobs, the Mexican family is involved in the processing coffee beans and the Japanese father does research into water pollution.
